reviewText: This one definitely kept my attention.  Great introductions, professionally done, good lighting and real interviews.  Takes all the guess work out it.  The best one yet.

I have a few of these Hot body dvds.  They all are pretty much the same.  Girls dancing around stripping until they are totally nude.  This one has a girl named Cricket that will get your blood going.  I have different priorities now then I did when I got these. But you know what your getting if you get any of these.
This is just fine. The women who are professional entertainers do very well. The less talented amateurs are presented as such. This is a niche film. Bring your own sense of humor.
Best DVD I ever watched thanks....
Summer Leigh on cover is hot in this DVD
Summer Leigh and Cricket are really hot.

Those of you who have grown up with Hot Body videos know exactly what to expect. Beautiful women in a softcore adult dvd. Full frontal and even closeups. The sad thing is that Hot Body is no longer producing new dvd's or VHS tapes and the prices are actually starting to rise. Check out ebay for some ridiculous bidding on Hot Body VHS tapes. When you find dvd's for less than $17 snatch them up. There aren't many out there and Smokin' Summer Heat is definitely one to grab.
